perturbation.original_text:
Fees: The Fees for the Project shall be $279,000.00
Payment Schedule: Client shall pay Developer:
20% Deposit ($55,800.00) to be paid at the start of the project. 20% ($55,800.00) to be paid upon completion of Milestone #1. 20% ($55,800.00) to be
paid upon completion of Milestone #2.
20% ($55,800.00) to be paid upon completion of Milestone #3.
20% ($55,800.00) to be paid upon completion of Milestone #4.
*Milestone Delivery Schedule for Phase 1
Milestone #1 –January 1st, 2019
Milestone #2- February 1st, 2019.
Milestone #3 – March 1st, 2019.
Milestone #4 – April 1st, 2019.
perturbation.changed_text:
Fees: The Fees for the Project shall be $279,000.00
Payment Schedule: Client shall pay Developer:
20% Deposit ($55,800.00) to be paid at the start of the project. 20% ($55,800.00) to be paid upon completion of Milestone #1. 20% ($55,800.00) to be
paid upon completion of Milestone #2.
20% ($55,800.00) to be paid upon completion of Milestone #3.
20% ($55,800.00) to be paid upon completion of Milestone #4.
*Milestone Delivery Schedule for Phase 1
Milestone #1 –January 1st, 2019
Milestone #2- February 1st, 2019.
Milestone #3 – March 1st, 2019.
Milestone #4 – May 1st, 2019.
perturbation.explanation: This change introduces an in-text contradiction by altering the completion date of Milestone #4 from 'April 1st, 2019' to 'May 1st, 2019'. This creates ambiguity and uncertainty regarding the payment deadline associated with Milestone #4, as the completion date and payment obligation are no longer aligned, potentially leading to disputes.

perturbation.original_text:
Commission fees - 25% commission on delivery orders. Admin will have the ability to change the % or fee based on
dispensary
§
Flat fees - $1 in store pickup orders through the app or website
§
Subscription Fee - $500 a month subscription per store
perturbation.changed_text:
Commission fees - 25% commission on delivery orders. Admin will have the ability to change the % or fee based on
dispensary
§
Flat fees - $1 in store pickup orders through the app or website
§
Subscription Fee - $500 a month subscription per store.
§
Subscription Fee - $750 a month subscription per store.
perturbation.explanation: This change introduces an in-text contradiction by adding another subscription fee clause of $750. This creates ambiguity and uncertainty regarding the subscription fee, as now there are two different values specified, potentially leading to disputes.

perturbation.original_text:
§
Upon arrival at customer location, driver must verify customer identity by taking a picture of/scanning the customer's
ID. Once the customer's ID is verified and the product is delivered, the customer must confirm receipt of the product for
the order to be considered complete.
perturbation.changed_text:
§
Upon arrival at customer location, driver is NOT required to verify customer identity by taking a picture of/scanning the customer's
ID. Once the product is delivered, the customer must confirm receipt of the product for
the order to be considered complete.
perturbation.explanation: This change introduces an in-text contradiction by negating the requirement for the driver to verify the customer's ID. This creates ambiguity and uncertainty regarding the ID verification process, as now there are conflicting statements about whether it is required, potentially leading to disputes and security concerns.
